GOAL_CREATED_SUCCESSFULLY: Your goal has been created successfully! Start tracking your progress today.
FAILED_TO_CREATE_GOAL: We couldn't create your goal at this time. Please try again later.
GOALS_RETRIEVED_SUCCESSFULLY: Your goals have been retrieved successfully.
FAILED_TO_RETRIEVE_GOALS: We couldn't retrieve your goals at this time. Please try again later.
FAILED_TO_RETRIEVE_GOAL: We couldn't retrieve this goal's details. Please try again later.
GOAL_NOT_FOUND: The goal you're looking for doesn't exist or has been removed.
INVALID_GOAL_ID: The goal ID provided is invalid. Please check and try again.
GOAL_UPDATED_SUCCESSFULLY: Your goal has been updated successfully!
FAILED_TO_UPDATE_GOAL: We couldn't update your goal at this time. Please try again later.
NOT_AUTHORIZED_TO_UPDATE_GOAL: You don't have permission to update this goal. Only the goal creator can make changes.
GOAL_DELETED_SUCCESSFULLY: Your goal has been deleted successfully.
FAILED_TO_DELETE_GOAL: We couldn't delete your goal at this time. Please try again later.
NOT_AUTHORIZED_TO_DELETE_GOAL: You don't have permission to delete this goal. Only the goal creator can delete it.
GOAL_LIKED_SUCCESSFULLY: You've liked this goal. The creator will be notified of your support!
LIKE_REMOVED_SUCCESSFULLY: You've removed your like from this goal.
FAILED_TO_LIKE_GOAL: We couldn't process your like at this time. Please try again later.
GOAL_THUMBS_DOWN_SUCCESSFULLY: You've given this goal a thumbs down.
THUMBS_DOWN_REMOVED_SUCCESSFULLY: You've removed your thumbs down from this goal.
FAILED_TO_THUMBS_DOWN_GOAL: We couldn't process your feedback at this time. Please try again later.
DISLIKE_REMOVED_AND_LIKED_SUCCESSFULLY: Your thumbs down has been changed to a like. Thanks for your support!
LIKE_REMOVED_AND_DISLIKED_SUCCESSFULLY: Your like has been changed to a thumbs down.
GOAL_COMPLETED_SUCCESSFULLY: Congratulations! You've marked this goal as complete for today.
GOAL_ALREADY_COMPLETED: You've already completed this goal today. Keep up the good work!
FAILED_TO_COMPLETE_GOAL: We couldn't mark your goal as complete. Please try again later.
NOT_AUTHORIZED_TO_COMPLETE_GOAL: You can only complete goals that you've created.
GOAL_STATS_RETRIEVED_SUCCESSFULLY: Your goal statistics have been retrieved successfully.
FAILED_TO_RETRIEVE_GOAL_STATISTICS: We couldn't retrieve your goal statistics at this time. Please try again later.
INVALID_FREQUENCY: Please select a valid frequency: daily, weekly, or monthly.
TITLE_REQUIRED: Please provide a title for your goal.
DESCRIPTION_REQUIRED: Please provide a description for your goal.
FREQUENCY_REQUIRED: Please select how often you want to track this goal (daily, weekly, or monthly).
SOMETHING_WENT_WRONG: Something unexpected happened. Our team has been notified and is working on it.
TOEKN_REQUIRED: Authentication required. Please log in to access this feature.
GOAL_MARKED_AS_COMPLETE: Congratulations! Your goal has been marked as complete for today.
GOAL_ALREADY_COMPLETED_TODAY: You've already completed this goal today. Great job staying on track!
GOAL_STATISTICS_RETRIEVED_SUCCESSFULLY: Your goal progress statistics have been retrieved successfully.
